item.title: come ctf with me #3 - metactf 2020 part 1 - password here please
item.description: MetaCTF 2020 - Password Here Please For this CTF, I'll upload the challenges I found interesting as individual write-ups. I don't know how many I'll do (time is a bastard) but I'll try and get at least a few. For this challenge specifically, I have the source code down below, as well as my full script in the tl;dr. Description I forgot my bank account password! Luckily for me, I wrote a program that checks if my password is correct just in case I forgot which password I used, so this way I don't lock myself out of my account.

item.title: come ctf with me #2 - acictf - pt 1
come ctf with me #1 - kringlecon 2019 - pt 2
item.description: Mongo Pilfer - CranberryPi After the last CranPi, I took a week break from the ctf to focus on work, but with the arrival of the weekend and completion of some overdue errands, I was ready to go. To get into the swing of things, I decided to start cleaning up the other CranberryPis I dutifully noted before, starting with Holly Evergreen's in the NetWars Continuous room (where I made a cameo!

item.title: come ctf with me #1 - kringlecon 2019 - pt 1
item.description: Kringlecon 2: Turtle Doves! I'm starting Kringlecon a day late this year, but I'm hoping to be able to at least get as far as I got last year. This time, I plan on documenting my findings, and I'll be updating this as I go. My plan is for this to be one big post, almost in a journal/gamefaqs style. Escape Ed - CranberryPi This one is easy, but I did have to google since i'm unfamiliar with ed.
